node.title: Wide delivery: Outback postie celebrates 260,000km of providing vital service
node.alt: woman fills large postal box with mail on outback property
node.description: Bec Climie services iconic pubs, police stations, cattle properties and homes where people would otherwise have to trek hundreds of kilometres for urgent goods and mail.
node.content:
["After quitting her job on a whim in 2016, Bec Climie took up a role running the mail in outback Queensland.", "Since then she's clocked up 260,000 kilometres on the odometer \u2014 that's like driving around Earth (at the equator) more than six times!", "Residents in remote communities in the state's north-west\u00a0rely on Ms Climie to send and receive basic goods, equipment and, of course, their mail.", "She services iconic pubs, police stations, cattle properties and homes where people would otherwise have to trek hundreds of kilometres each week.", "", "
Ms\u00a0Climie services the iconic Blue Heeler Hotel in Kynuna.(Supplied: Bec Climie)
", "\"Without this service, people in these locations would have to be travelling over 200 kilometres each time they need something from in town.", "\"Imagine being in the middle of a mustering season and then urgently needing parts but having to try to find the time to drive that distance to pick it up.", "", "
The area where Ms Climie conducts her mail run is made up of 34 properties.(Supplied: Google Maps)
", "Based out of the Julia Creek post office, Ms Climie conducts one of seven weekly mail runs in the region.", "\"Depending on which run you're on, you either get your delivery on a Monday and a Thursday or a Tuesday and a Friday.\"", "Her run is a roundabout route servicing 34 properties from Julia Creek out to Kynuna and McKinlay.", "\"So, I go towards Kynuna first on a Monday and I go towards McKinlay first on a Thursday, which gives each property the chance to get cold food delivered earlier in the morning, once a week.", "\"That's about 567 kilometres. I leave at about 7am and I'm usually back by 4:30pm.\"", "She said some of her colleagues did mail runs of more than 1,000 kilometres.", "", "
Ms Climie has travelled 260,000 kilometres over five years on her mail run.(Supplied: Bec Climie)
", "
More than just the mail
", "Ms Climie said over the years both staff and customers on the mail run had become a \"little community\".", "Meanwhile, catching up with people on their properties each week is a highlight.", "\"I love calling in on my customers.\u00a0I do deliver to a lot of mailboxes, but I do stop in at a few houses as well, although I try to keep chats short\u00a0as I've got to also pick up their mail and take it back to the post office before it shuts.\"", "", "
Cattle troughs along the way provide a bit of relief in the sweltering heat.(Supplied: Bec Climie)
", "
Carrying a heavy load
", "Ms Climie said she had\u00a0mastered the art of Tetris the way she had\u00a0to pack her Toyota HiLux each week.", "\"At times I am so full with mail, particularly since COVID-19 has triggered this massive volume of parcels.", "\"I actually love the challenge of fitting everything on because you need to pack it in the order that it's gonna come off.", "\"And you need to pack the fragile stuff away from the bottom et cetera, so it's a good challenge. I get a lot of joy out of packing my truck.", "", "
Ms Climie says she has mastered the art of Tetris through loading different items onto her trailer.(Supplied: Bec Climie)
", "
Navigating outback roads
", "After five years on the mail run, Ms Climie has mastered her muscle memory for dodging every pothole on her route \u2014 she can tell exactly where she is based on the same shrubs she passes each week.", "But even Ms Climie hasn't been able to avoid a breakdown on the outback roads.", "\"I've broken down twice and I've been stuck once, but all those times I've been lucky to have such a great community on my run and they've helped me out every time.", "\"If anything happened, people know I'm pretty consistent with my run so if I don't show up it's likely they'd call around to find me.\"", "", "
After five years on the mail run, Ms Climie is familiar with the outback roads.(Supplied: Bec Climie)
", "Being a delivery driver in a harsh climate has forced Ms Climie into becoming a bit of a car buff.", "\"I've never learnt so much or had to be so involved in cars. You're constantly looking at what the car needs and I've never used so much fuel in my life, but it's all a learning curve and it's good fun.\"", "As she celebrates five years on the job, Ms Climie says\u00a0she looks\u00a0forward to continuing on the postal run."]
